summary: Implements a CKAN extension that supplies utilities for converting internal entity identifiers into readable, human‑friendly labels. The module defines a plugin class that integrates with CKAN’s plugin system and offers methods to obtain helper objects, identify group classifications, and determine whether a fallback representation should be used. It also includes an isolated helper routine for performing the humanization of entity types.
business_intent: Enhance the usability of CKAN interfaces by presenting clearer, more understandable names for datasets, groups, and other entities, thereby improving user experience and supporting fallback mechanisms when standard labels are unavailable.
